name: Scarecrow Fire Hoedown
description:
Scarecrow Fire Hoedown is a platformer made during a 48-hour game-jam. Take control of Sketch, a brave, young scarecrow, as he tries to traverse the perilous cave and avoid its aviary inhabitants.

In the world of Cornarth, being scary is everything. However, the hero of our tale isn't scary in the slightest. Sketch must venture to the temple of the scarecrow elders with the cave's torches and his flammable body as his only weapons. Alternate between immolation and safety to reach the end and help Sketch save his home.

Most of the team was comprised of members of PolyKnight Games. We're currently working on our first commercial game, InnerSpace, which we've spent much more than 48-hours developing.

If you like it, let us know!
